title: Project Planning and Requirements Gathering
description: Define the project scope, objectives, and requirements for the Parallel Programming Lab environment, including the target audience, learning objectives, programming languages and concepts to be covered, and the desired user experience.

title: System Architecture Design
description: Design the overall system architecture, including the components, interfaces, and data flow for the Parallel Programming Lab environment.

title: User Interface Design
description: Design the user interface for the Parallel Programming Lab environment, including the coding challenges, visualizations, and user interactions.

title: Parallel Programming Challenges Development
description: Develop the coding challenges and exercises for teaching parallel programming concepts.

title: Visualization Components Development
description: Develop the visualization components to help students understand parallel programming concepts.

title: Database Design and Implementation
description: Design and implement the database schema for storing user progress, challenge data, and other relevant information.

title: Security and Access Control Implementation
description: Implement security measures and access control mechanisms to ensure data privacy and system integrity.

title: Testing and Quality Assurance
description: Plan and execute comprehensive testing strategies, including unit tests, integration tests, and user acceptance tests.

title: Deployment and DevOps
description: Set up the deployment pipeline, infrastructure, and continuous integration/continuous deployment (CI/CD) processes.

title: Documentation and User Guides
description: Create comprehensive documentation, user guides, and tutorials for the Parallel Programming Lab environment.
